001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.service;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.dao.UserDao;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.entity.User;
006import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
007import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
009import java.time.Instant;
010import java.util.List;
011import java.util.Objects;
012import javax.inject.Inject;
013import javax.inject.Singleton;
014
015@Singleton
016public class UserRepository {
017
018  private final UserDao userDao;
019  private final GoogleSignInService signInService;
020
021  @Inject
022  UserRepository(UserDao userDao, GoogleSignInService signInService) {
023    this.userDao = userDao;
024    this.signInService = signInService;
025  }
026
027  public Single<User> getCurrent() {
028    return getOrCreate().subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
029  }
030
031  public LiveData<User> get(long id) {
032    return userDao.select(id);
033  }
034
035  public LiveData<List<User>> getAll() {
036    return userDao.select();
037  }
038
039  public Single<User> save(User user) {
040    return (
041        (user.getId() == 0)
042            ? insert(user)
043            : update(user)
044    )
045        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
046  }
047
048  public Completable delete(User user) {
049    return (
050        (user.getId() == 0)
051            ? Completable.complete()
052            : checkSafeDelete(user)
053                .flatMap(userDao::delete)
054                .ignoreElement()
055    )
056        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
057  }
058
059  private Single<User> getOrCreate() {
060    return signInService
061        .refresh()
062        .flatMap((account) -> userDao.select(account.getId())
063            .switchIfEmpty(
064                Single
065                    .fromSupplier(() -> {
066                      User user = new User();
067                      user.setOauthKey(Objects.requireNonNull(account.getId()));
068                      user.setDisplayName(Objects.requireNonNull(account.getDisplayName()));
069                      user.setUserPhoto(
070                          (account.getPhotoUrl() != null) ? account.getPhotoUrl().toString()
071                              : null);
072                      return user;
073                    })
074                    .flatMap(this::insert)
075            )
076        );
077  }
078
079  private Single<User> insert(User user) {
080    user.setCreated(Instant.now());
081    return userDao
082        .insert(user)
083        .map((id) -> {
084          user.setId(id);
085          return user;
086        });
087  }
088
089
090  private Single<User> update(User user) {
091    return userDao
092        .update(user)
093        .map((count) -> user);
094  }
095
096  private Single<User> checkSafeDelete(User user) {
097    return getOrCreate()
098        .map((u) -> {
099          if (u.equals(user)) {
100            throw new IllegalStateException("");
101          }
102          return u;
103        });
104  }
105
106}
